Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the suspension of tolls collected during a state declaration of disaster emergency
Summary: Requires the suspension of the collection of tolls on public roads during a state declaration of disaster emergency on the New York state thruway.
LawCode: Amd ยง361, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the suspension of tolls on public roads during a state declaration of disaster emergency
